name: Paper for Firefox
description: This Firefox style is an imitation of the GTK 3.14/16/18/20 theme Paper. The screenshot at right shows its similarity to the file browser. This theme formerly enabled the findbar to automatically expand to fill the available width. That functionality is now contained in the separate style Auto-Expand Ctrl-F Findbar.
additional_info: The icons used are Flattr v1.3. Some GTK apps change the colour of their internal elements depending on whether or not the window has focus. This theme does not cause Firefox to emulate that behaviour. Tested on GTK 3.18 and Firefox 48.
